content:
AnyEventHandler Delegate

Definition

Represents the method that will handle the AnyEventRaised event of a build.

In this Article

public delegate void AnyEventHandler(object sender, BuildEventArgs e);
Inheritance
Object
System.Delegate
AnyEventHandler
